advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
sellerName: The Football Association Premier League Ltd
releaseNotes:
This version includes minor improvements and bug fixes.


Let us know if you have any feedback via app@premierleague.com.
description:
Official and free to download, the Premier League app is your essential companion to the world’s most-watched football league. Get fast, verified football scores, detailed stats and the latest stories from every match, every club and every player.

Follow the action live with Matchday Live, dive deeper with PL Companion, and shape the experience around you with myPremierLeague. Manage your Fantasy Premier League team, listen to Premier League Radio (where available) and explore decades of unforgettable Premier League moments in the archive.

Follow every game with Matchday Live
• Verified live scores, in-match stats and live table updates
• Key moments as they happen: goals, line-ups, red cards and more
• Links to watch official broadcasts where available, so you never miss a kick

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories
• Vertical match stories from every ground, as the action unfolds
• Big moments, reaction and context in an easy-to-swipe feed
• Direct routes into club and broadcaster platforms for even more content

Make it yours with myPremierLeague
• Choose your favourite clubs, players and matches
• Personalised news, videos and stories based on what you care about
• Smart alerts so you’re first to know about line-ups, goals and major updates

Play Fantasy Premier League on the go
• Full management of your Fantasy Premier League squad from anywhere
• Track live FPL points while you follow the football scores and stats
• Enjoy Classic, Draft and Challenge formats all in one place

Listen live with Premier League Radio
• Live match commentary and analysis from around the league
• The sounds of Premier League matchday, wherever you are*
*Subject to territory restrictions; certain broadcasts are not available in the UK and Ireland.

Explore the Premier League Archive
• Relive over 30 years of Premier League football
• Video highlights, stats and kits from thousands of classic matches
• Rediscover iconic goals, rivalries and title races from 1992 to today

Discover clubs, players and stats
• In-depth profiles for every club and player to have featured in the Premier League
• Fixtures, results and standings across multiple competitions
• Rich football stats to help you understand the game in more detail

Whether you’re checking live football scores, tracking Fantasy points, listening in on matchday or reliving classic moments, the Premier League app keeps you closer to the action – every day of the season.
